title: Investigating the Zeeman Effect
summary: Reproducing the Zeeman splittings with a Cadmium lamp in presence of a magnetic field, and finding the ratio of elementary charge and mass of an electron using the splitting distance.

title: Investigating AC driven RC/RL circuits
summary: Finding the Voltage across and Reactance of Capacitors and Inductors driven by an AC current in a four part experiment.

title: Experimentally Obtaining the Speed of Light
summary: Measuring the speed of light using a light transmitter, reciever and an oscilloscope and evaluating the sources of error.
